org.arl.fjage.shell

Class EchoScriptEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.shell.EchoScriptEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptEngine

    public class EchoScriptEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScriptEngine
    Implements a simple script engine that simply echoes whatever is sent to it. This is useful for testing purposes.

        public boolean offer(java.lang.String s)

      • input

        public java.lang.String input()
        Description copied from interface: ScriptEngine
        Gets an input offered by ScriptEngine.offer(String). Blocks until an input is available or an interrupt. This is used to allow interactive scripts.
        Specified by:
        input in interface ScriptEngine
        Returns:
        input string, or null if input not supported
